member.summary: Default implementation of for public consumption.

member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftTopicTranslator
member.summary: Default implementation of . Used to extract information about which CommSift categories may have failed for the given request. Note that we are mapping their IDs in enums.

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftTopicTranslator.ExtractFilteredTopics(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int32,System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Takes a list of topic IDs and sccores from a community sift response, and returns corresponding enums for the topics that are over the filtering threshold, which indicates that they were a reason the text was filtered.
Currently only considers the score of the PII topic
member.param: A map of topic IDs to the score the text rated for that topic

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftTopicTranslator.TranslateTopicIdToEnum(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a Community Sift topic ID to an enum. These mappings are taken directly from the Community Sift documentation pages. Accurate as of 13 MAR 2017
member.returns: The enum if a mapping exists, otherwise null

member.summary: Result of calling the chat endpoint with no context enabled.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftChatFilterNoContextResult.TextWasFiltered
member.summary: Indicates that the text was filtered.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftChatFilterNoContextResult.FilteredText

member.summary: The Community Sift Moderation Topics that caused the text to be filtered.

member.summary: UserName of the author of the text to be filtered. Useful for Cs.

member.summary: Age Category of the author of the text.

member.summary: Text to be filtered.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftChatNoContextRequest.Server
member.summary: Category grouping for the source of the text.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftChatNoContextRequest.Room
member.summary: Subcategory grouping for the source of the text.

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftTopicTranslator
member.summary: Converts the Community Sift Topic IDs that are returned in filter calls to an enum value

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.UserId
member.summary: Optional. Your unique identifier for the player (ROBLOX UserId)

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.RuleSet
member.summary: Optional. Identifier of the ruleset to use, along with the topic-risks of text and our history of player, to determine the pass/fail result (See Administration -> Rulesets) Example Value: 1

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.Filtered
member.summary: Optional. A past filtering result you want to provide for auditing purposes. By adding a value here you are asking it to report on what has changed since this text was last filtered. false = not filtered, true = was filtered previously

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.MessageId
member.summary: Optional. Your message identifier. This is provided in case you need a way to associate responses with your messages independent of requestBase/response semantics length(msg_id) ≤ 255

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.Text
member.summary: Required. What the player would like to say

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.Username
member.summary: Optional. A friendly name for the user that will be used for display purposes. (ROBLOX Username) Helpful when using a numeric identifier in player field. We also accept user_display_name for backwards compatibility

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.Server
member.summary: Optional. The server that the chat came from, if you want to identify it for searching/filtering. For our case, it's PlaceID / "web_chat" / "web_post" / "web_asset" / "web_pm" Reference: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jHMlnHeGcvhyG5j_p067j1xw5bHZrwdJS7qJeifBUMk/edit#

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.Room
member.summary: Optional. The chat room that the chat came from, if you want to identify it for searching/filtering. For our case, it's GameInstanceId or ConversationId. In cases where this is not provided a "random" GUID should be delivered as per our 2016-09-15 conversations with them.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.Language
member.summary: Optional. Expected language of the text, if known, as a two letter ISO language code for a supported language Default Value: "*" (Language detection. Added 03/07/2016) Example Value: "en"

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextRequestBody.ToJson
member.summary: Convert this object to a JSON string representing the current object.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextResponseData.Language
member.summary: (Always present) Either the language from the input or the auto-detected language.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatNoContextResponseData.RedactedText
member.summary: (May be omitted) RedactedText version of the input text. Only returned if Response is false and the text is high risk (4 or higher).

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftModerationTopic
member.summary: The set of moderation topics as defined by Community Sift

member.summary: Result of a UserName request.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameFilterResult.IsPrimaryTextFiltered
member.summary: Indicates if the text was filtered for 13+ users.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameFilterResult.PrimaryFilteredText
member.summary: The new value of the text with hashes for 13+ users. Null otherwise.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameFilterResult.IsSecondaryTextFiltered
member.summary: Indicates if the was filtered for U13 users.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameFilterResult.SecondaryFilteredText
member.summary: The new value of the text with hashes for U13 users. Null otherwise.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameFilterResult.FilteredCategories
member.summary: The Community Sift Moderation Topics that caused the text to be filtered.

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameRequest
member.summary: Basic interface for making a request to the CommunitySift UserName endpoint, which is currently used for search in Roblox.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameRequest.Text
member.summary: The text to be filtered.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameRequest.UserId
member.summary: Id of the user making the request. Use -1 for "anonymous" user.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameRequest.IsUnder13
member.summary: If the author of the text is under 13.

member.summary: Execute the given HttpRequest against CommunitySift. Environment-level configurations for CommunitySift are handled within.

member.typeparam: Object type into which the response will be deserialized from JSON.
member.param: Path to the API endpoint.
The HttpMethod used by this call.
List of parameters fokr the query string.
Object containing the data to be POSTed. This data will be serialized into JSON.

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatRequestBody
member.summary: CommunitySift Request Body

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatRequestBody.UserId
member.summary: Optional. Your unique identifier for the player (ROBLOX UserId)

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatRequestBody.RuleSet
member.summary: Optional. Identifier of the ruleset to use, along with the topic-risks of text and our history of player, to determine the pass/fail result (See Administration -> Rulesets) Example Value: 1

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatRequestBody.Filtered
member.summary: Optional. A past filtering result you want to provide for auditing purposes. By adding a value here you are asking it to report on what has changed since this text was last filtered. false = not filtered, true = was filtered previously

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatRequestBody.MessageId
member.summary: Optional. Your message identifier. This is provided in case you need a way to associate responses with your messages independent of requestBase/response semantics length(msg_id) ≤ 255

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatResponseData
member.summary: Response from the community sift chat endpoint

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatResponseData.Language
member.summary: (Always present) Either the language from the input or the auto-detected language.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatResponseData.Hashed
member.summary: (May be omitted) Hashed version of the input text. Only returned if Response is false and the text is high risk (4 or higher).

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatResponseData.MessageId
member.summary: (May be omitted) The msg_id from the input. Only returned if non-empty msg_id was in input.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftChatResponseData.Text
member.summary: The text response from CommunitySift. Only valid if Response is false and the text is high risk (4 or higher).

Name of the parent service making these called. Used for logging.

member.summary: Internal constructor allows us access to the performanceMonitor.

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftClient.PostChat(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftChatRequest)
member.summary: Post a short piece of text to CommunitySift.
member.param: The containing the required parameters for CommunitySift

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftClient.PostLongText(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftLongTextRequest)
member.summary: Post a long piece of text to CommunitySift. Generally 1000+ characters.
member.param: The containing the required parameters for CommunitySift

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftClient.PostDoubleChat(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftDoubleChatRequest)
member.summary: Post a piece of chat as both under and over 13 in a single call. Note that the chat will be truncated to 1000 characters. For longer text use PostLongText().
member.param: An containing the required parameters for CommunitySift
member.returns: An containing the results for both age categories.

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftClient.PostUserName(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameRequest)
member.summary: Post a the given UserName and check its validatity for both over and under 13.
member.param: The containing the required parameters for CommunitySift
member.returns: An containing the results for both age categories

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftClient
member.summary: Defines methods for CommunitySift API calls

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftClient.PostChat(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftChatRequest)
member.summary: Post a short piece of text to CommunitySift.
member.param: The containing the required parameters for CommunitySift

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftClient.PostLongText(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftLongTextRequest)
member.summary: Post a long piece of text to CommunitySift. Generally 1000+ characters or 2000 bytes. This text will not be added to the user context which means that it won't have vertical filtering applied.
member.param: The containing the required parameters for CommunitySift

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftClient.PostChatNoContext(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftChatNoContextRequest)
member.summary: Post a short piece of text to CommunitySift. This text will not be added to the user context which means that it won't have vertical filtering applied.
member.param: The containing the required parameters for CommunitySift

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftClient.PostDoubleChat(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftDoubleChatRequest)
member.summary: Post a piece of chat as both under and over 13 in a single call.
member.param: An containing the required parameters for CommunitySift
member.returns: An containing the results for both age categories.

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftClient.PostUserName(Roblox.CommunitySift.ICommunitySiftUserNameRequest)
member.summary: Post a the given UserName and check its validity for both over and under 13.
member.param: The containing the required parameters for CommunitySift
member.returns: An containing the results for both age categories

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment
member.summary: Details on Fragments of text returned from calls that can span multiple paragraphs.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.RiskLevel
member.summary: (Always present) The risk level.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.Response
member.summary: (Always present) Whether the text passed the selected ruleset.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.Timeout
member.summary: (Always present) If the processing timed out.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.Hashed
member.summary: (May be omitted) Hashed version of the input text. Only returned if response is false and the text is high risk (4 or higher).

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.FragmentLength
member.summary: (Always present) The length of the fragment.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.FragmentStart
member.summary: (Always present) The start of the fragment in the overall text.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.Topics
member.summary: (May be omitted) The topic risk levels identified for the text.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.Hashes
member.summary: (May be omitted) Where hashes were placed in the text.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.StatusCode
member.summary: Status Code for Internal Use

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextFragment.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Custom Error Message for Internal Use

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextResponseData
member.summary: Response from the community sift Long Text endpoint

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextResponseData.Escalations
member.summary: (Always present) List of any queues the text was escalated into

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextResponseData.FailingFragments
member.summary: (Always present) Array of fragments of the text that fail the ruleset. Contains fragment start, length, list of hash positions in the fragment as well as topics.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextResponseData.Risk
member.summary: (Always present) The general overall risk level identified for the entire text

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextResponseData.Events
member.summary: (Always present) Chat and moderation events for the user such as trust changes

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextResponseData.Hashed
member.summary: (May be omitted) Hashed version of the input text. Only returned if Response is false and the text is high risk (4 or higher).

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextRequestBody
member.summary: CommunitySift Request Body

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextRequestBody.UserId
member.summary: Optional. Your unique identifier for the player (ROBLOX UserId)

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextRequestBody.RuleSet
member.summary: Optional. Identifier of the ruleset to use, along with the topic-risks of text and our history of player, to determine the pass/fail result (See Administration -> Rulesets) Example Value: 1

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftLongTextRequestBody.MessageId
member.summary: Optional. Your message identifier. This is provided in case you need a way to associate responses with your messages independent of requestBase/response semantics

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftRequestBase
member.summary: CommunitySift Request Body Base

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftRequestBase.Text
member.summary: Required. What the player would like to say

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftRequestBase.Username
member.summary: Optional. A friendly name for the user that will be used for display purposes. (ROBLOX Username) Helpful when using a numeric identifier in player field. We also accept user_display_name for backwards compatibility

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftRequestBase.Server
member.summary: Optional. The server that the chat came from, if you want to identify it for searching/filtering. For our case, it's PlaceID / "web_chat" / "web_post" / "web_asset" / "web_pm" Reference: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jHMlnHeGcvhyG5j_p067j1xw5bHZrwdJS7qJeifBUMk/edit#

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftRequestBase.Room
member.summary: Optional. The chat room that the chat came from, if you want to identify it for searching/filtering. For our case, it's GameInstanceId or ConversationId. In cases where this is not provided a "random" GUID should be delivered as per our 2016-09-15 conversations with them.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftRequestBase.Language
member.summary: Optional. Expected language of the text, if known, as a two letter ISO language code for a supported language Default Value: "*" (Language detection. Added 03/07/2016) Example Value: "en"

member.name: M:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftRequestBase.ToJson
member.summary: Convert this object to a JSON string representing the current object.

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftResponseBaseData
member.summary: Base community sift response

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftResponseBaseData.Trust
member.summary: (Always present) The trust level of the user.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftResponseBaseData.Response
member.summary: (Always present) Whether the text passed the selected ruleset.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftResponseBaseData.Topics
member.summary: (May be omitted) The topic risk levels identified for the text.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftResponseBaseData.Text
member.summary: The text response from CommunitySift, if Response is true this will be set.

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftResponseBaseData.StatusCode
member.summary: Status Code for Internal Use

member.name: P:Roblox.CommunitySift.CommunitySiftResponseBaseData.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Custom Error Message for Internal Use

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.Properties.ICommunitySiftTopicTranslatorSettings
member.summary: CommunitySift settings specific to translating Topic and Risk levels. In particular these map to settings in the Community Sift Policy Guides.

member.name: T:Roblox.CommunitySift.Properties.Settings
member.summary: Configuration that uses Roblox.Configuration.Provider
